global handle use for memo by Vm.debug() and Catalog

appendNext

public static boolean appendNext
flag to indicate that this is the first write to jump log. Clearing this flag means that the next write to the log remove any previous contents. The default bahavior is to clear the log the first time text is added.

traceInitialized

private static boolean traceInitialized
flag used to init the report interface.
